mapper.select: select role.* from role left join user_role ur on ur.role_id = role.id where ur.user_id = #{userId} and role.is_deleted = 0

select role.* from role left join role_resource rr on rr.role_id = role.id left join resource on resource.id = rr.resource_id where rr.request_url = #{requestUrl} and role.is_deleted = 0 and resource.is_deleted = 0
